items.content_html: In this article we introduce a few tools and techniques for studying relationships between the stock market and the news. We explore time series processing, anomaly detection, and an event-based view of the news. We also generate intuitive charts to demonstrate some of these concepts, and share the code behind all of this in a notebook.

items.content_html: Machine Learning has revolutionized the world, yet expensive computation costs on model trainings are often a large limitation, especially for large data sets or elevated precisions. VMC Consulting offers a new algorithm called Fast Kriging (FKR), which allows to train models with the high precision of Kriging at a speed 100+ times faster, without compromising precision, for any data set size.

items.content_html: Posted by Laura Downs and Anthony Francis, Software Engineers, Robotics at Google Many recent advances in computer vision and robotics rely on deep learning, but training deep learning models requires a wide variety of data to generalize to new scenarios.
